author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Thirty-Nine! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

In 2022 Jeremy, the creative behind the YouTube channel Black Magic Craft, pulled together a group of designers, writers and artists to pen one of the bleakest Dark Fantasy miniature games out there; Idols of Torment. Want to play the bad guys, fighting other bad guys over the scraps of lost souls in an interstitial realm called The Echo that was created after Heaven and Hell collapse? Then this is the game for you. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebook in digital  HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/442271/Idols-of-Torment?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 039 - IDOLS OF TORMENT  by Black Magic Craft
